name: Virtual Card Table
description:
A Virtual Card Table for you and your friends to play any card game you can think of, the way You play it.

The app is perfect when you don't have a real card deck at hand or when space is limited. Play on an airplane, in the car, at the beach, at school, at work, with yourself, with friends. Virtual Card Table is all you need.

Many features, basic and advanced
* Add player hands, decks and custom cards
* Reset table in one tap

Three gestures controls everything
* Drag and position everything where you want it
* Tap once on player hands, decks or cards to perform main feature
* Double tap player hands, decks or cards for advanced features

Some advanced features
* Quick custom dealing of cards
* Shuffle randomly or order decks and hands by suit or rank
* Make deck from pile of cards on table
* Pick up or drop many cards at once
* Turn all cards on players hand face down or face up

Please, leave a review or contact developer with any comments.

Have a great time playing!
